name: workweek
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the days or hours that are spent working during one week: a 37-hour workweek
the time when most people are working during a week, usually from Monday to Friday: The medical team extended the workweek to include Saturdays.

Add to word list
Add to word list
the days or hours that a person spends working during one week: Many offices operate on a thirty-five hour workweek.
Workweek also means Monday through Friday, when most people are working.
